row.name: question
row.column: A qué se dedica un funambulista?
A person who likes fun above all.

row.name: question
row.column: Amelia Earhart disappeared over the central Pacific Ocean on July 2, 1937. But what do we know her for?
También trabajó como telefonista y funcionaria de Correos pero, por qué se conoce a Clara Campoamor Rodríguez?
As the first female pilot to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean.
Nurse in the iconic Times Square kiss photo at the end of WWII.
She was the winner of the Pulitzer for "Gone With the Wind".
Principal impulsora del sufragio femenino en España, logrado en 1931.
De sus estudios sobre la radioactividad, antes de que el cáncer la matara.
Campoamor fue una espía infiltrada durante la guerra civil española.

row.name: question
row.column: The film begins on the night before Thanksgiving. Who starred as Rocky Balboa?
La película comienza la noche antes de acción de gracias. Quién protagonizó a Rocky Balboa?

row.name: question
row.column: What would a Scotsman do with a spurtle?
Wear it, it's a winter waistcoat.
Play it, it’s a type of Scottish pipe.

row.name: question
row.column: The problem now appears to be on the mend thanks to the 1987 Montreal Protocol. Ozone hole refers to...
El contenido en ozono se mide en Unidades Dobson. Y el agujero de ozono se refiere a:
Decrease in the ozone layer in troposphere.
Decrease in thickness of ozone layer in stratosphere.
Increase in the thickness of ozone layer in troposphere.
Decremento de la capa de ozono en la troposfera.
Decremento del grosor de la capa de ozono en la estratosfera.
Incremento del grosor de la capa de ozono en la troposfera.

row.name: question
row.column: Whether you watched or not the London 2012's Olympic Games, could you name a famous athlete for inventing a new athletics technique?

row.name: question
row.column: Plants can absorb energy from light; however, plants receive their nutrients mainly from...
En la cultura mediterránea no puede faltar, pero… ¿Qué grasas hacen saludable el aceite de oliva?

row.name: question
row.column: To whom did the Red Queen told: ‘it takes all the running you can do, to keep in the same place.’?

Ninguno, todavía no se había adoptado el sistema de sets.

row.column: One small calorie or gram calorie (cal) is approximately 4.2 joules. What has more energy?
Una caloría equivale exactamente a 4,1868 julios. ¿Qué contiene más energía?

row.name: question
row.column: The Empire State Building is a 102-story skyscraper in Manhattan. In which decade did the building get finished?
El Empire State is un rascacielos de 102 pisos situado en Manhattan. En qué década se terminó de construir el Empire State de Nueva York?

El mayor planeta de nuestro sistema solar es Júpiter. Cuál es el más rápido?

La ciudad con más población en el mundo es...

Quién completó la primera circunnavegación del mundo?

row.name: question
row.column: '...can you repeat the question? You're not the boss of me now...' is the beginning of which TV show
'...can you repeat the question? You're not the boss of me now...' De qué programa de TV estamos hablando?

row.name: question
row.column: Octopuses have four pairs of arms. But who of the following has fewer legs?
Los pulpos tienen cuatro pares de brazos. Pero cuál de los siguientes tiene menos patas?

row.name: question
row.column: Black mambas can reach up to 14 feet. What colour is a black mamba snake?
Las mambas negras pueden alcanzar hasta 4,5 metros. Sabrías decir de qué color son?

row.name: question
row.column: The average life expectancy of a camel is 40 to 50 years. What does a camel store in its hump?
La esperanza de vida media de un camello es de 40 a 50 años. Sabes qué almacena un camello en su joroba?

row.name: question
row.column: Of the following women warriors, who fought against the Roman Empire?
Cual de las siguientes mujeres guerreras luchó contra el imperio romano?

row.name: question
row.column: As you well know, 5 is a prime number. What is the value of 5! (5 factorial)?
Como bien sabrás, 5 es un número primo. Sabes cuánto es 5! (5 factorial)?

row.name: question
row.column: Their brain-to-body mass ratios are similar to mammals and birds. But what is the largest species of shark?
Su porcentaje de masa corporal y cerebral es similar al de mamíferos. Pero cuál es la especie de tiburón más grande de todas?

row.name: question
row.column: Ned Flanders is the next door neighbour to the Simpson family. And how old is Flanders?
Ned Flanders es el vecino de los Simpson. Sabes cuántos años tiene Flanders?

row.name: question
row.column: Beetlejuice is a 1988 American comedy directed by Tim Burton. Do you remember whether Beetlejuice suit had?

row.name: question
row.column: In what children's game are participants chased by someone designated "It"?
En qué juego de niños los participantes hablan de medias mangas y mangas enteras?

row.name: question
row.column: Sex and the City is an American television comedy-drama series primarily set in what city?
'Sex and the City' es una serie de TV Americana. En que ciudad está basada la historia principalmente?

row.column: In the U.S., something traditional is often said to be 'as American as' what?
Cuál de los siguientes jugadores de la selección española de futbol es el más joven?

row.name: question
row.column: Which of the following Spanish words is a kitchen utensils most commonly used to grate cheese?

row.name: question

'You can check out any time you like, but you can never leave'. De qué lugar habla la canción de los Eagles de 1976?

row.name: question
row.column: All kingdoms and empires meet their end. Montezuma was the legendary leader of what ancient people?
Ningún reino dura eternamente. Moctezuma fue un líder legendario de qué civilización?

row.name: question
row.column: What novel features a tribe of cannibals known as the Morlocks?
En qué novela aparece una tribu de caníbales llamados Morlocks?

El antiguo templo hindú de Angkor Wat está en qué país?

row.column: In mythology, who is the Greek counterpart to the Roman goddess Minerva?

Cuánto dura un cuarto normal en un partido de la NBA?

row.name: question
row.column: Synthetoceras was a mammal that lived about 8 million years ago. It looked like a horse, except for one detail.
Synthetoceras fue un mamífero que vivió hace unos 8 millones de años. Se parecía a un caballo excepto por un detalle...
It had a horn on its snout.
Tenía un cuerno en su hocico.

row.name: question
row.column: In a standard deck of 52 playing cards, which king has no moustache?
En una baraja estándar de 52 cartas de póker Americano, qué rey no tiene bigote?

row.name: question
row.column: who is known as the father of medicine?
No recordarás quién es el padre de la medicina?

row.name: question
row.column: This dating system was devised in 525. Which year followed 1 BC?
Este sistema de fechas fue concebido en el 525 dc. Qué año siguió al 1 ac?

row.name: question
row.column: The Antarctic Desert is the largest desert of the planet. Which is the largest city in the Mojave Desert?

row.column: The five hundred euro note is the highest value euro banknote. What is currently the highest denomination banknote in the USA?

row.name: question
row.column: He’s known for the separation of the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church. Who was the first wife of King Henry VIII?

The Greek word Theos which means god.

row.column: Perhaps you don't drink any alcohol. Nevertheless, which liqueur is used in a 'Sidecar'?

was the daughter of a famous Indian singer.
became known for her political ruthlessness.
fue la hija de un famoso cantante indio.
vivió hasta la edad de 90 años.
se le conoció por su crueldad política.

row.name: question

Claramente son ya parte del pasado. De qué color son las cabinas telefónicas francesas?

A way of saying calm down.
Chandrío es un vino dulce del Pirineo.
Es un trueque del que sales favorecido.

row.name: question

row.column: According to the legend, St Patrick rid Ireland of what?

She is the only woman to have run the Tour the France.
